attributes.action: make it harder for companies in the UK to close workplaces, re-opening in cheaper economies increasing already huge profits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To many companies, especially multi nationals are relocating to places like China for no reason other than to increase already huge profits eg Burbury. This is done only for greed. Making it harder would only level the playing field for workers, as companies would have to justifytheir claims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
